DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center, prospective observational study will evaluate the treatment patterns, and the safety in patients with HER2-positive (HER2+) metastatic breast cancer (MBC). Eligible patients will have an initial metastatic breast cancer diagnosis that has not been previously treated with systemic therapy; patients may be enrolled up to 6 months after the diagnosis. Data will be collected for up to 8 years.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study in Patients With HER2 Positive Metastatic Breast Cancer (SystHERs Registry)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/=18 years of age Initial diagnosis of HER2+ MBC, as diagnosed by the treating physician, no more than 6 months prior to study enrollment Availability of cancerspecific historical data points in the patient's medical records Any inability to provide informed consent
